LanguageData.LordKuper.WorkManager.Settings.WorkPrior: Work Priorities
Update frequency
Determines how often pawn work type priorities will be updated.
Assign dedicated workers

If enabled, the mod will assign dedicated workers to work types according to the settings of the specific work type.\nIf disabled, the mod will assign work types to pawns with the highest skill level.
Dedicated worker priority
Default dedicated work type priority. Can be overriden in work type's settings.
Skill level score factor
Skill level factor for the colonist's overall score when determining dedicated workers.
Passion level score factor
Passion level factor for the colonist's overall score when determining dedicated workers.
Skill learning rate factor

Skill learning rate factor for the colonist's overall score when determining dedicated workers.\nSkill learning rate decreases after receiving a certain amount of experience points for that skill. It will impact work priority depending on the value of this setting.
Highest skill worker priority
Work priority to be used for pawns with the highest skill value.
Assign all work types
Assign every pawn all leftover work types with priority value set below to prevent idling.
Leftover work priority
Priority for leftover work types.
Assign additional work to idle pawns
Assign idle pawns all work types (except special ones) for 12 hours.
Idle work priority
Priority for work types assigned to idle pawns.
Prioritize work by passion levels
Assign work priorities based on pawn's passion level. Value of 0 means that the corresponding passion level will be ignored.
Prioritize work by skill learning rates

Assign work priorities based on pawn's skill learning rate.\nSkill learning rate decreases after receiving a certain amount of experience points for that skill. It will impact work priority if this setting is enabled.
Use individual skill learning rate thresholds
Use skill learning rate thresholds calculated for each pawn individually, considering their minimal and maximal skill learning rates.
Minor skill learning rate threshold
Pawns with skill learning rate above this threshold will be assigned to corresponding work types with priority value set below.
Minor learning rate work priority
Priority for work types with learning rates between minor and major thresholds.
Major skill learning rate threshold
Pawns with skill learning rate above this threshold will be assigned to corresponding work types with priority value set below.
Major learning rate work priority
Priority for work types with learning rates above major threshold.
LanguageData.LordKuper.WorkManager.Settings.WorkTypes: Work Types
* Default *
Select work type assignment rule to edit it.
Add new work type assignment rule that will override the default rule for the selected work type.
Delete existing non-default work type assignment rule.
Reset all work type assignment rules to default.\nWARNING: THIS WILL DELETE ALL CUSTOM RULES AND RESET ALL RULE PROPERTIES TO THEIR DEFAULT VALUES!
Select work type assignment rule using the button above.
Work type assignment rule for '{0}'
The settings specified on this tab will be applied for '{0}' work type assignment.
Default work type assignment rule
The settings specified on this tab will be applied to work types that do not have special rules that override the defaults.
Rule summary
Yes
No
The setting's value from the default rule will be used.
The settings from the default rule will be used.
Allowed workers
The settings in this section determine which pawns are considered eligible for assignment to a work type.
Assignment settings
Settings that define the criteria for assigning a work type and its priority.
Assign everyone
The job will be assigned to all eligible workers.
The job will be assigned according to other settings (dedicated workers, work passions, etc.).
Assign everyone priority
The priority value with which work will be assigned to all eligible workers.
Ensure worker assigned
At least one worker will be assigned even if no pawn satisfies the allowed workers filter.
A worker will only be assigned if there is a pawn that satisfies the allowed workers filter.
Dedicated workers settings
Settings that determine the criteria for assigning dedicated workers.
Allow dedicated workers
The dedicated workers will be assigned according to the settings in this section.
No dedicated workers will be assigned.
Worker number calculation mode
Specifies the method for calculating the target number of allocated workers.
Target number of workers
The number of dedicated workers that will be assigned to the work type.
Work type number factor
The target number of dedicated workers will be calculated by multiplying the number of work types by this number and rounding up to the nearest integer number.
Pawn ratio factor

The target number of dedicated workers will be calculated by dividing the number of capable pawns by the number of work types that use dedicated workers, multiplying by that number, and rounding to the nearest integer number.
Pawn number factor
The target number of dedicated workers will be calculated by multiplying the number of pawns that meet the criteria below by this number and rounding to the nearest integer number.
Available pawns
List of pawns that satisfy the allowed workers filter.
LanguageData.LordKuper.WorkManager.DedicatedWorkerMod: A fixed number of dedicated workers will be assigned to a type of work.
The number of dedicated workers will be assigned as a multiple of the total number of work types.

The number of dedicated workers will be assigned equal to the number of capable pawns divided by the number of work types using dedicated workers, rounded up to the nearest integer number.\nFor example, if there are 6 capable pawns in a colony and 5 work types use dedicated workers, then 2 dedicated workers will be assigned to each of these 5 types of work. (6 / 5 = 1.2 ≈ 2)
The number of dedicated workers will be assigned as a multiple of the number of pawns that meet the specified selection criteria.
LanguageData.WorkManager.GlobalEnableTooltip: Enable automatic work type priority assignment system
LanguageData.WorkManager.GlobalDisableTooltip: Disable automatic work type priority assignment system
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnEnableTooltip: Enable automatic work type priority assignment for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnDisableTooltip: Disable automatic work type priority assignment for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.WorkTypeEnableTooltip: Enable automatic priority assignment for work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.WorkTypeDisableTooltip: Disable automatic priority assignment for work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnScheduleEnableTooltip: Enable automatic schedule management for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnScheduleDisableTooltip: Disable automatic schedule management for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_UseLearn: Use skill learning rates instead of passions
Use skill learning rates instead of passion levels for determining major and minor priorities
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_MajorPas: Priority for work types with major passion (burning)
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_MinorPas: Priority for work types with minor passion (interested)
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_UsePawnL: Use individual skill learning rate thresholds
Use skill learning rate thresholds calculated for each pawn individually, considering their minimal and maximal skill learning rates
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_MajorLea: Pawns with skill learning rate above this threshold will be assigned to corresponding work types with priority value set below
Priority for work types with learning rates above major threshold
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_MinorLea: Pawns with skill learning rate above this threshold will be assigned to corresponding work types with priority value set below
Priority for work types with learning rates between minor and major thresholds
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_Uncontro: Uncontrollable pawns are unfit for work
Do not assign work for uncontrollable (downed, mental or stuck) pawns
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_Recoveri: Recovering pawns are unfit for work
Do not assign work for pawns needing medical rest
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AssignWo: Assign idle pawns all work types (except special ones) with lowest priority for 12 hours
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_SpecialR: Use special rules for doctoring assignment. These include assigning doctoring to highest-skilled pawn(s) only; assigning secondary doctor when primary doctor needs tending; assigning multiple doctors if multiple units need rescuing.
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AssignMu: Assign multiple doctors when there are multiple downed pawns
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_CountDow: Each downed colonist will require additional doctor to be assigned
Each downed guest will require additional doctor to be assigned
Each downed prisoner will require additional doctor to be assigned
Each downed colony animal will require additional doctor to be assigned
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_SpecialR: Use special rules to determine which pawns are considered hunters
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AllowMel: Allow barehanded pawns and pawns with melee weapons equipped to be assigned to hunting
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_AssignEve: Work types listed in this section will be assigned to every capable pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_WorkTypeN: The name of a work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_WorkTypeP: Priority with which work type will be assigned to a non-dedicated pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_AllowDedi: Allow work type to be assigned to the most suitable pawn with top priority
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_WorkTypeN: This work type is absent from current game setup. It will not affect work assignment until the game is restarted with the corresponding work type loaded.
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_DisabledW: Work types listed in this section will not be assigned to foreign members of your colony (e.g. temporary quest-related visitors)
Work types listed in this section will not be assigned to slaves
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Schedule_UpdateFreq: How many times to update schedules per in-game day
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Schedule_WorkShiftT: Pawns will be assigned to a work shift only if number of eligible pawns is equal or higher than this value (always equals 1 for first work shift)
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Schedule_NightOwlWo: Work shifts for colonists with 'Night Owl' trait
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Misc_VerboseLogging: Show mod execution details in log (only works when development mode is enabled)
